mapper.select: SELECT NEWS_NO AS newsNo, TITLE AS title, CONTENTS AS contents, IMAGE_URL AS imageURL, THUMBNAIL_URL AS thumbnailURL, PRESS AS press, CATEGORY AS category, NEWS_DATE AS newsDate, NOUNS AS nouns FROM luxian.NEWS limit 9;

SELECT NEWS_NO AS newsNo, TITLE AS title, CONTENTS AS contents, IMAGE_URL AS imageURL, THUMBNAIL_URL AS thumbnailURL, PRESS AS press, CATEGORY AS category, NEWS_DATE AS newsDate, NOUNS AS nouns FROM luxian.NEWS limit #{cnt}, 10;
select KEYWORD as keyword, BTF_RATIO as btfRatio from luxian.realtime order by btf_ratio desc limit 10;
select CLUSTER_NUM as clusterNum, ARTICLE_INDEX as articleIndex, CNT as cnt from luxian.cluster order by cluster_num
